outputFile.description: The target output of the archive relative to the workspace root. Should be a file with extension `.tar`, `.tar.gz`, `.tar.bz2`, or `.zip`.

package.description: The package to archive instead of the current project.

version.description: A version constraint to find the package to archive.

ignoreFilters.description: ignore all filters in the `archive.exclude` property of the `composer.json` file.

noScripts.description: Skip any scripts in the composer.json file.
